1370: Andreas moved to Breestraat.D.2 after marriage.
Got married to Aghete at age 22 in 1370.
1373: Had a daughter with Aghete, Mette, at age 25.
1376: Had a son with Aghete, Wederic, at age 28.
1380: Had a son with Aghete, Grote, at age 32.
1384: Had a son with Aghete, Willibrando, at age 36.
1385: Had a son with Aghete, Gerrit, at age 37.
1386: Lost son Gerrit when Gerrit was 2 years old.
1389: Had a daughter with Aghete, Wijfgode, at age 41.
1390: Lost daughter Ricmoden when Ricmoden was 0 years old.
Lost his wife Aghete and their daughter Ricmoden  while Aghete was giving birth when he was 42.
1391: Lost daughter Wijfgode when Wijfgode was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
